title: Enhancement - Pick database on logon
author: flyer292
body_snippet:
Allow for a database selection screen when you first launch the application

You could then have several profiles setup that connect to different databases (same options for each profile, DB Server, Database, userID & password - blank just uses you AD credentials

Additional Options
Option 1 - If you need to be connected to different databases at the same time just open several consoles
Option 2 - Ability to connect to several profiles within your single application.  Where it shows Connec...

iterations.description: The issue contains only a title with no body or comments, so the enhancement requirements are too vague to implement reliably.

Feasible enhancement to allow selecting database environment on startup. Can be implemented by adding a new setting and injecting a selection dialog (reusing existing SQL config UI) into the startup sequence.
Feature request to allow selecting/switching between multiple SQL database profiles at startup, enabling multi-database workflows
The feature is partially implemented (FrmDatabasePicker) but lacks localization, proper AuthType persistence in profiles, and tests.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The issue contains only a title with no body or comments, so the enhancement requirements are too vague to implement reliably.
Approach: Ask for specific logon database-selection behavior (UI location, default choice, persistence rules, and error handling) before implementation planning.
AI triage (gemini): Feasible enhancement to allow selecting database environment on startup. Can be implemented by adding a new setting and injecting a selection dialog (reusing existing SQL config UI) into the startup sequence.
Approach: 1. Add `ShowDatabasePickerOnStartup` setting to OptionsDBsPage. 2. Update `SqlServerPage` UI to include a checkbox for this setting. 3. Create a new form `FrmPickDatabase` that hosts an instance of `SqlServerPage` (or similar controls) to allow modifying DB settings. 4. In `Runtime.LoadConnections`, check the new setting and if enabled, show `FrmPickDatabase` before attempting to load connections.
AI triage (claude): Feature request to allow selecting/switching between multiple SQL database profiles at startup, enabling multi-database workflows
Approach: Add a database profile manager (list of named DB connection configs) and a profile selection dialog shown at startup when SQL mode is enabled with multiple profiles configured
AI triage (gemini): The feature is partially implemented (FrmDatabasePicker) but lacks localization, proper AuthType persistence in profiles, and tests.
Approach: Finalize FrmDatabasePicker, ensure AuthType is correctly saved/loaded in DatabaseProfile and SqlServerPage, add localization, and add tests.
